name: Motorland
description:
Motorland is a city planning game that needs strategic planning but was also inspired by idle games such as Cookie Clicker. Build factories to gain minerals, parks to against the pollution produced by factories, build turrets to prevent asteroids, after everything is set up, Sit down and enjoy the sight!

I am a solo developer and this game will receive unscheduled updates. If you find any bugs please don't hesitate to let me know. I would love to know any ideas to improve this game, any of your thoughts might be applied in future updates.

Controls:

Left Click - Interact

WASD / Arrow keys - Move camera

F / PageUp - Zoom in

R / PageDown - Zoom out

PC build save path: 

The save file is located in %userprofile%\AppData\Local\Motorland0123\Save\save1.txt
